title: Is Spell Vamp Worth it on Malzahar ?
body: Well Malzahar's E apply full spell vamp and E is normally the spell u max 1st on Malzahar. With a {{item:3145}}  when you have lvl 1 E you will get 2.4 health per second (ignoring resistance) and at level 5 E you will heal for 9.6 per second. So is spell vamp worth it on Malzahar ?

replies.body: for my 3erd and 4th I like to get a {{item:3152}}  and a {{item:3146}} but first you need about 300 to 400 ap before you get about 100 hp back every sec from just e and w

Depends on what your up against and why you would be buying it, you have to remember that it will delay your spike in lane (you just gave up 20 AP for that spell vamp) and delay your entire build, for lane sustain, and yes you'll basically be able to sit in lane all day, that's not really a good thing though.

Of course it depends on scenario though.

Of course im not talking about it as a first item unless maybe if im against someone like Azir or some annoying long range poke mage. The extra sustain in lane should be nice.

>Of course im not talking about it as a first item

Then just flat out don't get it, it's no real use outside of laning phase because there will be champions that will just flat out delete you and focus spells like Ignite and items like Morello on you.

The main reason to get it is for the lane sustain it gives over anything else, but you just have to remember you are delaying yourself.
